snippet.title: Chaos on Deponia - Console Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Chaos on Deponia - available on December 6th, 2017 for PS4 and Xbox One! 

-- Game description --
Rufus is back on Deponia. Once again follow him throughout his journey in a 2D world that has degenerated into a vast garbage dump. Meet bizarre characters to make them part of your story. Enjoy their wacky humor and make hours of remarkable conversations. 
After the events in the original Deponia, now it seems that Rufus came to his senses. He's grown prudent, amicable, kind and caring, without any intention to cause major mayhem just to further his own selfish ends. It seems he is far from chaining himself to flaming saw blades, training torpedo-dolphins or foraging through platypus nests. Or is he?
The unique, hand-drawn comic style of the Deponia Series along with the adorable characters and a detailed story makes this game an unforgettable experience.
